column5: Grandchildren ,they make yer day dont they. Little Shiyla has me wrapped and all I can say is,what a bundle of joy.            Just had to share this.  So Memart,you enjoying yours? LOL
Yours came with a remote? How cool is that!
LOL  She likes to push the buttons.
And to think you were making fun of Rob...
That's classic    What a sweetie Brian.  Have you gotten her a fishing rod yet?  Joey
And the best thing is...............you can give them back! On the other hand that can also be the worst thing....*sigh*
Yep...If we had known Grandchildren were so much fun...we would have had them first...  Looks good on you Brian...
